channel.title: InnerDemon - web designer needed - InnerDemon
channel.description:
Hey guys.
So basically, I'm looking for a website developer who knows what he's doing. I'm not looking for [u]just[/u] forums, I'm looking for capabilities as to making tables, creating databases, encryption, etcetera. I don't really mind if it's not VB, but using "smfforfree". I would like if that person had their own host that I can access FTP-wise (for cache, webclients, highscores, player data, SQL).
Here's the server you'll be signing up for if you do decide to join in:
Update log of what I've done (doesn't include what was already programmed in):
[ul][li]Added Graham's event manager[/li] [li]Fixed deadlocking of server, can now run for days without restarting[/li] [li]Action sending[/li] [li]Rewritten cycle event manager[/li] [li]Full single-door and double-door handling (Killamess)[/li] [li]God book preaching[/li] [li]Player type (normal player or hero)[/li] [li]Editted XP distribution[/li] [li]Nearly all skills rewritten, all of them were half-assed[/li] [li]Implemented A-Star pathfinding, just need to implement[/li] [li]All "processes" converted into events using Graham's manager[/li] [li]SQL integration[/li] [li]Highscores integration with SQL[/li] [li]Bank pins and resetting using SQL[/li] [li]Security questions using SQL[/li] [li]Player saving with SQL and .txt files for safety[/li] [li]MySQL pooling system (Nikki)[/li] [li]Wilderness obelisks redone for better quality[/li] [li]NPCKill system implemented[/li] [li]Cheap version of achievements created, will use actual interfaces later on[/li] [li]Warrior's guild finished fully[/li] [li]Teleporting rewritten to update regions more effectively[/li] [li]NPC region implemented from Hyperion[/li] [li]Overall region updating from Hyperion[/li] [li]Hyperion game engine[/li] [li]Created "Deathtoll" minigame[/li] [li]8 quests (lacking detail for now, will go back and add length to them)[/li] [li]Emotes, map updating, and items dumped[/li][/ul]
This is a 317 loading 508 cache maps, items, NPCs, loading gameframe's 377, 474, 483, 508, 525, and 562 with player/npc cache updating to your desire (all options located in the Jframe panel).
Some pictures since they are required for making such a thread... [IMG]http://i1117.photobucket.com/albums/k582/mikestolarz/12-30-20111-03-20PM.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1117.photobucket.com/albums/k582/mikestolarz/12-30-201112-17-31PM.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1117.photobucket.com/albums/k582/mikestolarz/12-30-201112-39-34PM.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1117.photobucket.com/albums/k582/mikestolarz/12-30-201112-55-29PM.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1117.photobucket.com/albums/k582/mikestolarz/1-1-201212-42-30AM.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1117.photobucket.com/albums/k582/mikestolarz/1-1-201212-43-23AM.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1117.photobucket.com/albums/k582/mikestolarz/1-1-201212-44-54AM.png[/img]
So, if you are interested and fulfill the above, please PM me here or simply add me on MSN - mike.stolarz@live.com. Thanks for your time.
If your wondering when this will be released for "public play", it could take 2-3 weeks. But, I do promise that I won't release it until I am satisfied 100% with it's stability and features.

item.dc:creator: @Mr_Rushed Mr Rushed
item.description:
@Mr_Rushed wrote:

Wet Dreamss:

Nice quest tab How long did getting them all take? :3

That quest tab was there from the beginning of the source he used he just edited a bit of it I think source he used is the source ZigiScape released saying it was a 508 and it was leeched but I can’t remember the main source.

Anyways Good Luck

item.title: InnerDemon - web designer needed - InnerDemon
item.dc:creator: @Nexus1 Nexus_
item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

asshole_rule:

Why would you implement A star pathfinding… just because it was in hyperion doesn’t mean it’s gonna make your pi any better… that was pointless

I was implementing a bunch of Hyperion data and converting it, then I got to the pathfinding and I was like “hey, best do it now then later”. Maybe i’ll use it someday; it’s not like it takes up soooo much space.

runewings317:

Is this HyBriD PvP v2? And good luck!

No. I don’t use garbage.

Read full topic

[/quote]

Adding & messaging you now.

Edit; I added you, message me when ever you can, I’ll be online if I’m there.

item.title: InnerDemon - web designer needed - InnerDemon
item.dc:creator: @Nexus1 Nexus_
item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

Hey guys.

So basically, I’m looking for a website developer who knows what he’s doing. I’m not looking for just forums, I’m looking for capabilities as to making tables, creating databases, encryption, etcetera. I don’t really mind if it’s not VB, but using “smfforfree”. I would like if that person had their own host that I can access FTP-wise (for cache, webclients, highscores, player data, SQL).

Here’s the server you’ll be signing up for if you do decide to join in:

Update log of what I’ve done (doesn’t include what was already programmed in):

[ul][li]Added Graham’s event manager[/li]
[li]Fixed deadlocking of server, can now run for days without restarting[/li]
[li]Action sending[/li]
[li]Rewritten cycle event manager[/li]
[li]Full single-door and double-door handling (Killamess)[/li]
[li]God book preaching[/li]
[li]Player type (normal player or hero)[/li]
[li]Editted XP distribution[/li]
[li]Nearly all skills rewritten, all of them were half-assed[/li]
[li]Implemented A-Star pathfinding, just need to implement[/li]
[li]All “processes” converted into events using Graham’s manager[/li]
[li]SQL integration[/li]
[li]Highscores integration with SQL[/li]
[li]Bank pins and resetting using SQL[/li]
[li]Security questions using SQL[/li]
[li]Player saving with SQL and .txt files for safety[/li]
[li]MySQL pooling system (Nikki)[/li]
[li]Wilderness obelisks redone for better quality[/li]
[li]NPCKill system implemented[/li]
[li]Cheap version of achievements created, will use actual interfaces later on[/li]
[li]Warrior’s guild finished fully[/li]
[li]Teleporting rewritten to update regions more effectively[/li]
[li]NPC region implemented from Hyperion[/li]
[li]Overall region updating from Hyperion[/li]
[li]Hyperion game engine[/li]
[li]Created “Deathtoll” minigame[/li]
[li]8 quests (lacking detail for now, will go back and add length to them)[/li]
[li]Emotes, map updating, and items dumped[/li][/ul]

This is a 317 loading 508 cache maps, items, NPCs, loading gameframe’s 377, 474, 483, 508, 525, and 562 with player/npc cache updating to your desire (all options located in the Jframe panel).

Some pictures since they are required for making such a thread…

So, if you are interested and fulfill the above, please PM me here or simply add me on MSN - mike.stolarz@live.com. Thanks for your time.

If your wondering when this will be released for “public play”, it could take 2-3 weeks. But, I do promise that I won’t release it until I am satisfied 100% with it’s stability and features.
